body: You can perceive the world by creating high-pitched noises and listening to their echoes. This gives you blindsight to a range of 40 feet. The echo-producing noises are too high-pitched to be heard by most creatures, and can only be detected by dragons, other creatures with this ability (such as bats), and creatures with hearing-based blindsense or blindsight. You cannot use this ability if you are deaf, and cannot detect anything in an area of silence.
description: Sonic sense gives you blindsight 40 ft.
level_text: Alchemist: 4; Investigator: 4; Bard: 4; Skald: 4; Druid: 4; Hunter: 4; Sorcerer: 5; Wizard: 5; Arcanist: 5; Hunter: 4
name: Echolocation
